CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the In-Store Promotion stage positioned above or below the Retail Placement stage?
SRP.A: The In-Store Promotion stage is positioned {below} the Retail Placement stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {logarithmic} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Customer Purchase?
VE.A: The value of stage Customer Purchase is {367}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Launch in Market?
VE.A: The value of stage Launch in Market is {1832}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Taste Testing, with a value of {2988}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Repeat Purchase, with a value of {315}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Retail Placement to stage In-Store Promotion?
SC.A: Decreased by {479} Thousand Bottles from stage Retail Placement to stage In-Store Promotion.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 1493? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Taste Testing} stage has {2988}, the {Launch in Market} stage has {1832}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 341? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 521 and 1493? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Retail Placement} stage has {1155}, the {In-Store Promotion} stage has {676}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage In-Store Promotion to Customer Purchase, or from stage Customer Purchase to Repeat Purchase?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {In-Store Promotion} to {Customer Purchase} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Launch in Market to Retail Placement, from stage In-Store Promotion to Customer Purchase, or from stage Taste Testing to Launch in Market?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Taste Testing} to stage {Launch in Market} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Taste Testing} and {Launch in Market} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Customer Purchase} and {Repeat Purchase} stages.
